page.title: 02Ham Hill
page.content: Ham Hill is a popular walking place for the people of the nearby towns and villages. There are quite a few land marks on the hill. The{Monument}is seen clearly from the surrounding area. It has the names of the local people who died during the world wars. There are some slendid views to be seen here of the countryside. The{Bomb Shelter}has been used during the last world wars. It is very small and compact. There is also a destroyed Bomb Shelter which is covered with rocks. Ham Hill is also used for {quarrying stone (Ham Stone)}some of which is used for the local houses. Children and Families like to play games and have picnics and barbecues there. It is a child's paradise.
